description: Lists out all the different configuration commands for the bot.
Lets you add a specific user/role to a blacklist which makes them bypass the purges.
Lets you remove a specific user/role from the blacklist.
Starts a manual purge which will gather all inactive users and send specified channel for confirmation.
Sets the grace period for a certain role.
Sets the specified automated purge window (in days).
Sets a time window (in days) for a role before considering them inactive.
Shows members who are considered 'inactive' that are eligible to be purged.
